Keywords: Avengers , Celebrity , Fantastic Four , Lady Liberators , S.H.I.E.L.D. , Spy
Real Name: Susan Richards
Special Powers
YEAH, MY POWER SET IS REALLY GOOD FOR ESPIONAGE: Stealth, [Improved Targeting: Hindering]. Adjacent friendly characters that share a keyword (with her) can use Stealth and [Improved Targeting: Hindering].
FORM THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: At the beginning of the game, you may replace up to 4 friendly characters with the same number of characters from your sideline on their starting clicks. All replacement and replaced characters must have the Fantastic Four keyword and different names. The total points of the replacement characters can't exceed the total points of the replaced characters.
I WON'T KILL ANYONE: Incapacitate. When Invisible Woman uses it, after resolutions hit characters modify attack -1 until your next turn.

Comments
February 19, 2021
Goop
I like her a lot. The improved targeting w/ triple bolt running shot incap is great. Reduces their attack also. The big problem is her ESD, she's already got stealth so its important to watch out for enemies that have charge. One good charge on her and she will go down to her later dial which pretty much sucks.
December 19, 2020
shawn11189
Am I the only one that thinks her form the new fantastic four trait is a mistake. the other 3 rares got a different trait that gave out powers to F4 keyworded pieces. her espionage trait is cool and works similarly but effects more pieces because it works on any piece that shares a keyword with her and she has multiple choices. and while doesn’t she have barrier anywhere.
July 30, 2020
Just Some Coffee
Just a fantastic piece. Pulled in a sealed, don't know that I would run this one in constructed but here stealth sharing alone was worth the cost of admission.
